name: Bigg Dee 3D Blast
description:
Bigg Dee 3D Blast is a fast paced action-runner game that lets you control Bigg Dee, a character from the Sentient Salad Studios show of the same name. Avoid obstacles and try to reach the end of the level as soon as you can!

Controls:

D-Right

A-Left

Versions:

1.0 (Dec 23, 2019)-Launch day build.
